products.desc: A croissant is a buttery, flaky, viennoiserie-pastry named for its well-known crescent shape.

products.title: PIZZA
products.desc: Pizza is a flatbread generally topped with tomato sauce and cheese and baked in an oven.

products.title: MILK

products.title: CREAM CHEESE
products.desc: Cream cheese is a soft, mild-tasting fresh cheese with a high fat content.

products.title: PORK TENDERLOIN
products.desc: The pork tenderloin, in some countries called pork fillet, is a cut of pork.

products.title: RIBS
products.desc: Pork ribs are a cut of pork popular in North American and Asian cuisines.

products.title: GROUND BEEF
products.desc: Ground beef, beef mince, minced beef, minced meat is a ground meat made of beef that has been finely chopped with a large knife or a meat grinder.

products.title: TUNA
products.desc: A tuna is a saltwater finfish that belongs to the tribe Thunnini, a sub-grouping of the mackerel family â€“ which together with the tunas, also includes the bonitos, ackerels, and Spanish mackerels.

products.title: SALMON
products.desc: Salmon is the common name for several species of ray-finned fish in the family Salmonidae.

products.title: OYSTERS
products.desc: The word oyster is used as a common name for a number of different families of saltwater clams, bivalve molluscs that live in marine or brackish habitats.

products.title: SCALOPS
products.desc: Scallop is a common name that is primarily applied to any one of numerous species of saltwater clams or marine bivalve mollusks in the taxonomic family Pectinidae, the scallops.

products.title: BANANA
products.desc: The banana is an edible fruit, botanically a berry, produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.

products.title: CUCUMBER
products.desc: Cucumber is a widely cultivated plant in the gourd family, Cucurbitaceae.

products.title: APPLE
products.desc: The apple tree is a deciduous tree in the rose family best known for its sweet, pomaceous fruit, the apple.

products.title: LEMON
products.desc: The lemon is a species of small evergreen tree native to Asia.

products.title: PEAR
products.desc: The pear is any of several tree and shrub species of genus Pyrus, in the family Rosaceae.
